comment: /**  * Return the line number in the XML resource that failed.  * @return the line number if available (in case of a SAXParseException). -1 else  * @see org.xml.sax.SAXParseException#getLineNumber()  */
code: /**  * Return the line number in the XML resource that failed.  * @return the line number if available (in case of a SAXParseException). -1 else  * @see org.xml.sax.SAXParseException#getLineNumber()  */ public int getLineNumber() {     Throwable cause = getCause().     if (cause instanceof SAXParseException) {         return ((SAXParseException) cause).getLineNumber().     }     return -1. }
